title: HABIB CFW 4.53 v1.01 + multiMAN v04.53.01 + ReactPSN v3.01 PS3

FEATURES:


1.) MADE OUT OF 4.53 OFW
2.) HAVE INSTALL PACKAGE FILES AND APP_HOME
3.) HAVE REACTPSN COMPATIBILITY
4.) PATCHED ALL COREOS ECDSA CHECK
5.) PATCHED LV2 TO ADD PEEK/POKE SUPOORT
6.) PATCHED LV1 TO DISABLE LV2 PROTECTION
7.) PATCHED LV1 TO ADD PEEK/ POKE SUPPORT
8.) IT CAN RUN GAMES SIGNED WITH KEYS UPTO 4.53
9.) CAN BE UPDATED OVER ANY CFW.
10.) CAN BE UPDATED OVER 3.55 OFW
11.) ADDED NO BT/BD PATCHES
12.) RSOD BYPASS
13.) REACTPSN OFFLINE PATCH ADDED
14.) BETTER SYSTEM STABILITY
15.) PSP REMASTER SUPPORT ADDED
16.) QA FLAG ENABLED BY DEFAULT IF PS3 WAS QA ON 3.55
17.) IN GAME SCREENSHOT ENABLED
18.)ANTI-PROTECTION FOR COPY-CATERS!








The requirement for the firmware PS3: original firmware is not above 3.55 (OFW 3.55) or any of custom firmware CEX (CEX CFW) 


The Custom firmware can be installed directly from the XMB on OFW3.55 / CFW3.55 / CFW4.21 / CFW4.30 / CFW4.40 / CFW4.41 / CFW4.46 / CFW4.50 / Rebug / Rogero / HABIB



Installation:

"Method 1


Remove the disc from BD drive

Copy the firmware file PS3UPDAT.PUP to USB flash drive (FAT32) to a folder PS3/UPDATE .
Insert the USB flash drive into the PS3.
Turn on the PS3.
On the PS3, select system updates, update from media and follow the instructions on the screen.
Firmware is installed.
Installing multiMAN completely




"Method 2


Remove the disc from BD drive

Copy the firmware file PS3UPDAT.PUP to USB flash drive (FAT32) to a folder PS3/UPDATE .
Insert the USB flash drive into the PS3.
Turn off the PS3.
Press the power button and hold until you hear two beeps after which the PS3 will turn off, then release the button.
Push the power button and hold it until you hear the first one short beep, followed by two short beeps, then release the button.
Make all the instructions on the screen, select system update in the very last paragraph.
PS3 some time off (do not touch the console at this point), and as a result will lead you to setup screen.
Firmware is installed.
Installing multiMAN completely
